title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O'Connor on Brady Over Belichick, Colin Defends Baker, Gives Week 4 Thoughts
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O'Connor on Brady Over Belichick, Colin Defends Baker, Gives Week 4 Thoughts
description:
Colin gives his reaction to Brady's win over Belichick (3:00), compares Kyle Shanahan to Matt Nagy (8:00), discusses the key to the Cowboys strong start (13:00), explains how Russell Wilson saved Pete Carroll's butt (18:00), and defends Baker Mayfield's awful performance in the Browns road win over the Vikings (24:00). Then, Ian O'Connor -- NY Post columnist and author of Belichick -- and Colin discuss what Belichick might've said to Brady in their postgame locker room meeting (26:00), how far the Patriots have fallen from the Brady era (28:00), how much losing Belichick can tolerate before walking away from the game (33:00), if the Brady/Belichick relationship was always destined to implode (40:00), and if the Yankees can win a playoff series (43:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
